ingredients.content: 28 oz fresh tomatoes, peeled and halved, (approx. 8 med. tomatoes)

preparations.content: Place tomatoes into mixing bowl and chop <b>15 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic, onion, chili and olive oil and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add pancetta and cook <b>5 min/250°F//speed 1<b>. Add reserved chopped tomatoes, salt and pepper and cook <b>20 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.

Place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and cook <b>15 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Serve immediately as a sauce or condiment or transfer to an airtight jar and store in the refrigerator for up to 3-4 days.
